title: Hotel New York
brief_description: This is the final version of “New York” shown by Jackie Raynal in 1980 as a work-in-progress. It is the story of Loulou Blanchot, a French filmmaker who decides to live in New York after having been invited to show one of her films there. Loulou begins to get acquainted with the city and gets a job as an editor for a porno film company.
